评论详情: I bought these for my granddaughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves them. Very loose and cute.
Great fit, so cute. Tern loved them!!

They are great pants that I find very comfortable. It’s not pants I’d wear camping or hiking though as much as it might look like that, because they are not going to keep you warm and the material is not thick.  The pictures I posted, I didn’t dress it up to be flattering. I’m obviously not a small build, I know how to make it flattering though. You just have to know how to make it work for your body. Great pants for the price though!

评论概述: Comfy and Super cute, High Quality
评论详情: I will add pics soon!  But I am a size 16/18, I have an apron belly. I love these pants. It doesn't hide the belly, but it doesn't make it too highlighted. I do love the color (purple), and the fabric is super high quality. Cons: The darts in the front waist made it seem like a "Diaper" front at some angles.  There are also darts throughout the pant leg to make it fall in certain ways. This can be a pro if you like that.

评论概述: no good if you have wide hips
评论详情: size was not right & color was way off, felt cheep on top of all that. I really wanted to like these but ended up needing to return them.

评论概述: These Pants Made Me Look Bloated
评论详情: When buying these pants, I got a small, because that's what I usually wear, however, when I tried this product on, it was a nightmare. The pants were a little tight, and they didn't give off much of a baggy look at all. The fabric felt cheap and thin, and the pants made my stomach area look bloated. There was so much air on the top part of the pants, and it was just super unflattering to wear. The color was also much brighter than the original image, which I was a little unhappy about to say the least. I will not be buying another pair of these pants anytime soon.
Was kinda hesitant on getting these cuz its hard to find big/curvy girl friendly pants but these fit so good and felt so nice

the fit is very odd. it's baggy at the top and bottom, but kind of tight around my knees. it makes sit both uncomfortable and unflattering. the sizing is fine it's just a very weird cut. the color is also a bit lighter than the picture.
